conversations.content: How much did I spend on the New Year's gift for my friend?

<function_thought>

</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_most_recent_transactions(n=100)]</function_call>

<function_thought>
I have retrieved the most recent transactions. Notably, there is a transaction dated '2022-02-12' labeled "New year gift" with an amount of 200.0. This appears to be the spending on the New Year's gift for the friend.

<function_call>[]</function_call>

<final_answer>
